text: Mireia Riera Casanovas (born March 14, 1975 in Lloret de Mar, Barcelona) is a swimmer from Spain. She has a physical disability: she has cerebral palsy and is an S7 type swimmer. She raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished second in the 100 meter freestyle race. She finished third in the 400 meter freestyle race. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Catalonia Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S7
title: Mireia Riera Casanovas
